oai_dc:dc.dc:title: KGR10 FastText Polish word embeddings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kocoń, Jan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Polish
embeddings
word embeddings
KGR10
Fasttext
skipgram
cbow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Distributional language model (both textual and binary) for Polish (word embeddings) trained on KGR10 corpus (over 4 billion of words) using Fasttext with the following variants (all possible combinations): - dimension: 100, 300 - method: skipgram, cbow - source text: plain, plain.lower, plain.lemma, plain.lemma.lower
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Wroclaw University of Science and Technology
